class.name: SVG
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Wrapper class around the SNAP SVG library

constructor.param: style data to pass to the SVG
Function to call when the SVG file has loaded

class.property: The internal SVG tag holding the drawing
A reference to the internal SVG DOM
The file path of the loaded SVG drawing

method.name: getElement
method.description: Returns a pointer to the given element within the SVG drawing
method.param: The id of the element to return
method.return: The element for the given elementID

method.name: getAttribute
method.description: Returns the value of the given element attribute
method.param: The id of the element to find
The attribute of the element to return.
method.return: The value of the given element attribute

method.name: setAttribute
method.description: Sets the value of the given element attribute and returns its value
method.param: The id of the element to find
The attribute of the element to set.
method.return: The value of the given element attribute
